title: Store

title: Apollo

title: BG Browser 2

description: An alternative app store for open source apps

title: Fennec

title: Pulse Music
description: An offline music player app, with modern UI and powerful features

title: Vanced Manager
description: Use the handy Vanced Manager to install YouTube Vanced with ease
